actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the Skagit River Basin, Washington, flood control project.

summary.text: Modifies the Skagit River Basin, Washington, flood control project to direct the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers: (1) to construct additional flood control measures; and (2) to incorporate recreation facilities in such project.

titles.title: A bill to modify the Skagit River Basin, Washington, flood control project.
